name: xpsn

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c0, c1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c1)), csn(cop(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: The Cartesian product of two singletons is the singleton consisting in the associated ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2006.)
